description: The system provides a mini-documentation of the development of the FY 2010 Section 8 Income Limits for any area of the country selected by the user. The user is provided a tooltip containing the name of the county, its median Income and the various 4 person Income limits like Very-Low Income (50%), Extremely-Low Income (30%), and Low Income (80%). County level summary of housing problems of low income households for 2009

name: Housing Problems of Low Income Households
